ComicInfo.Summary:
Katie Carva lives in Detroit, a tough town... it's even tougher when you moonlight as Vampblade and hunt invisible demonic space parasites! But the blades need to feed, so it's off to the rough side of town for some late night action.
Features regular and risqué variant covers by Jo Jaro that connect with Zombie Tramp variant covers.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Jose Jaro | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Jose Jaro | 4 | E | 90s Monster Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Mangum | 5 | F | 90's Monster Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Mangum | 6 |
